ok, im making a piece of performance art which i am entitling "escape from the midwest" i play the lead role of a college grad who spent his entire life in one stinking area and now prepares to get as far away as possible, my car (79 camaro in stage 2 of restoration) will play a supporting role of getting me out of this hick infested hole at high speeds, while looking kewl at the same time
 so i need suggestions of music to accompany this exodus.......
 
 
 in case you are confused i am going to graduate college (someday, i keep adding new degrees to my list of wants) and i nedd as much music as possible to listen to on my road trip towards my future, any song with leaving or footloose value, general road song, and barring that a good classic rock song will do
 
 examples of what i have so far, steppenwolf, born to be wild (so cliche) lyrnrd skynrd freebird, and linkin park runaway
 
 any help would be appreciated
 i still have a few yrs til i graduate but i believe in starting early, plus its just great music, keep my mind off where i am
 
 Mathurin
 with every muscle strained i prepare to run

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  soundtrack suggestions??
